data.comment: The match has started.
Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Portimonense to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Portimonense.
Luther Singh of Pacos Ferreira smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Pacos Ferreira pushes forward through Douglas Tanque, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 6, Pacos Ferreira have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Portimonense needs to be cautious. Pacos Ferreira have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 8, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Portimonense throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a throw-in for Pacos Ferreira, close to Portimonense's area.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Can Portimonense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pacos Ferreira's half?
In the minute 12, Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 14, Portimonense's Welinton Junior is on target but unsuccessful.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
Joao Amaral (Pacos Ferreira) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Portimonense a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Portimonense.
In the minute 17, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira close to the penalty box.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Fabricio (Portimonense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 21, In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Portimonense are coming forward and Fali Cande gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
In the minute 23, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 29, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Portimonense in Portimao.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
In the minute 33, Portimonense have a dangerous throw-in.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Important block from the Pacos Ferreira defence as Lucas Fernandes fires in a strike for Portimonense.
In the minute 34, Portimonense's Dener gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
Pacos Ferreira drives forward and Luther Singh gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 35, Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the home team in Portimao.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Portimonense.
In the minute 39, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 41, Oleg Reabciuk (Pacos Ferreira) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pacos Ferreira push forward at Estadio Municipal de Portimao and Douglas Tanque gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Portimonense defence.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Joao Amaral for Pacos Ferreira who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 44, Joao Amaral is back on the pitch.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira drive upfield and Luther Singh gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Portimonense defender.
In the minute 45, Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Portimao.
Lucas scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
Joao Amaral with an assist there.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica has blown to start the second-half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
Beto is replacing Pedro Sa for the home team.
In the minute 46, Aylton Boa Morte is on a sub for Anderson de Oliveira da Silva for Portimonense.
Portimonense needs to be cautious. Pacos Ferreira have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 47, Can Pacos Ferreira capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portimonense's half?
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Luiz Carlos for Pacos Ferreira gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Throw-in Portimonense.
In the minute 50, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Portimonense.
Free kick Portimonense.
Goal! Portimonense draw level to 1-1 through a Fabricio header.
In the minute 52, Great play from Lucas Fernandes to set up the goal.
Luther Singh is booked for the away team.
In the minute 54, Throw-in high up the field for Portimonense in Portimao.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 55, In Portimao Portimonense attack through Fabricio. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 57, Lucas Fernandes (Portimonense) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Portimonense.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Portimonense a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pacos Ferreira make their first substitution with Mohamed Diaby replacing Helder Ferreira.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the home team a throw-in.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the home team in Portimao.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Portimonense.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Portimonense a goal kick.
Can Pacos Ferreira get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
In the minute 68, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
Douglas Tanque (Pacos Ferreira) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
In the minute 71, Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 72, Julio Cesar is replacing Welinton Junior for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Aylton Boa Morte of Portimonense smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Joao Amaral with Lucas Silva. This is the second substitution made today by Pepa.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 76, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Throw-in for Portimonense close to the penalty box.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pacos Ferreira's Douglas Tanque breaks free at Estadio Municipal de Portimao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Portimonense advance rapidly upfield but Iancu Ioan Vasilica blows for offside.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a throw-in for Pacos Ferreira, close to Portimonense's area.
In the minute 81, Pacos Ferreira's Stephen Eustaquio breaks free at Estadio Municipal de Portimao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Portimonense have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paulo Sergio is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Municipal de Portimao with Fernando Medeiros replacing Lucas Fernandes.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
In the minute 83, In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 85, Portimonense are pushing forward but Beto's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Portimonense to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Portimonense throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
Portimonense have been given a penalty at Estadio Municipal de Portimao...
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Portimonense a penalty but Lucas misses from 12 yards.
Pacos Ferreira have been given a penalty...
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
